title: The Birds Don't Sing, They Screech in Pain
description: A run-in with a hostile motorist sends Danny into a rage â€” and a tense chase across town. Amy's unexpected guest leaves a lasting impression.

title: The Rapture of Being Alive
description: An enraged Amy finds new purpose as cracks in her seemingly perfect marriage begin to show. Danny seeks a fresh start for his failing family business.

title: I Am Inhabited by a Cry
description: Danny experiences a catharsis in the presence of an old flame. Amy's relationship with George suffers another setback. A catfishing scheme goes too far.

title: Just Not All at the Same Time
description: With her future hanging in a balance, Amy heads to Las Vegas for work while a smitten Paul and an exasperated Danny follow wild pursuits of their own.

title: Such Inward Secret Creature
description: As George makes a new friend, Danny proposes a dangerous plan, Amy agrees to a rendezvous, and Naomi acts on a hunch.

title: We Draw a Magic Circle
description: Fumi's pointed comments and Naomi's meddling put Amy and George on edge. As Isaac hustles to get out of trouble, Danny receives an unexpected offer.

title: I Am a Cage
description: Amy and Danny both experience positive changes in their lives, but lingering secrets and emotional challenges force them to confront hard truths.

title: The Drama of Original Choice
description: Painful memories of her youth push Amy to confront her family issues and marital woes. Danny spins an elaborate lie that leads him down a dangerous path.

title: The Great Fabricator
description: Danny moves from fear into panic as new crises arise. Willing to do whatever it takes to keep June safe, Amy devises a perilous scheme.

title: Figures of Light
description: The consequences of their actions leave Danny and Amy in a surreal situation that tests their grasp on reality.
